about_the_game:
Since 2017, Nolan Markey has been writing music inspired by the world of Beyond the Western Deep. When we began exploring the world in game form, Nolan immediately set to work writing a handful of pieces that would give our "interactive short story" a true sense of musical gravitas.

Nolan Markey is an orchestrator and composer who has contributed to music for several animated Star Wars series: The Clone Wars, Rebels, The Bad Batch, and Tales of the Jedi. Nolan also orchestrated music for the incredibly successful Kickstarter/Amazon Prime Video animated series Critical Role: The Legend of Vox Machina.
